snippet: Alex Rodriguez has instructed his representatives to refrain from the combative public approach they had adopted in recent days, saying the focus instead should be 100 percent on baseball.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez instructs his representatives to refrain from the combative public approach they have been taking regarding Major League Baseball's ongoing drug investigation.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez has instructed his representatives to refrain from the combative public approach they had adopted in recent days, saying the focus instead should be 100 percent on baseball.

headline.main: Rodriguez Calls End to Public Feuding
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Calls End To Public Feuding
